instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2849: What is 820-2849? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2849</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Charges slowly and cannot start from batteri when under 70%
threads.message:
I got this MBP 17"

It turns off when powered from battery and the charge goes below 70%. After this it can only start again when power supply is connected.

It then starts to slowly charge. It takes long time to get to 100%.

Tried another battery - same symptoms. Cannot start from battery power only until it reaches around 70%.

OS X says battery condition is normal

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2849</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Charges slowly and cannot start from batteri when under 70%
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2849</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Charges slowly and cannot start from batteri when under 70%
threads.message: Thanks. Just the confirmation I needed before switching them...

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2849</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Charges slowly and cannot start from batteri when under 70%
threads.message: Bingo! Working! Thanks yet again Mr Duke
